original_text: My fellow prisoner Aristarchus sends you his greetings, as does Mark, the cousin of Barnabas. (You have received instructions about him; if he comes to you, welcome him.)
korean_text: 나와 함께 갇힌 아리스다고와 바나바의 생질 마가와 (이 마가에 대하여 너희가 명을 받았으매 그가 이르거든 영접하라)

sentences.original_text: My fellow prisoner Aristarchus sends you his greetings
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 동료 간수 아리스타르가가 너희에게 문안을 보낸다

sentences.original_text: as does Mark, the cousin of Barnabas
You have received instructions about him
